title: Sword of the Stars - Born of Blood - A Murder of Crows
description:
*** BUY THIS GAME ! ***
It's worth every penny!

-----

This pack includes the full Sword Of The Stars game !

1. Original Sword Of The Stars (SotS)
2. Born Of Blood expansion (BoB)
2.1. Collector Edition upgrade + update 1.5.3 (CE)
2.2. Tutorial Videos for Collector Edition
2.3. ACM mod for Collector Edition 1.5.3
3. A Murder of Crows expansion + update 1.6.3 (AMoC)

-----

Also included:

- a very hard to find KeyGen - created by FFF ( doesn't work for online play )
- AMoC 1.6.3 Tech Tree ( huge 7077x1130 pixel image ) - created by Arkalius, Ixal, Stonefish
- AMoC startup screen ( 1680x1050 )
- Some Wallpapers for the game ( they are actually splash-screens from in-game loading )

No crack needed after patching to latest version, game is CD-Protection free !

-----

Enjoy !
